rows.label: qst702801_msg0001
rows.name:
Adel-sama, it's been a
while, mo! It's your
intelligence agent, Macmac, mo.

rows.label: qst702801_msg0002
rows.name:
You've grown so much, I hardly recognize
you, mo! If only Macmac were 30 years
younger... Hehe, just kidding, mo.

rows.label: qst702801_msg0003
rows.name:
I've been waiting for you all, mo. Recently,
some fool started dealing in poisons, and
it's been a real nuisance, mo.

rows.label: qst702801_msg0004
rows.name:
The goods are red pollen orbs,
mo. If you sell them to a fool,
you can make a ton of money, mo.

rows.label: qst702801_msg0005
rows.name:
Macmac is after that fool, mo. But
it seems the pollen orbs have already
been shipped out all over, mo.

rows.label: qst702801_msg0006
rows.name:
So... I have a request, mo.
Could you help me collect
the red pollen orbs, mo?

rows.label: qst702801_msg0007
rows.name:
The pollen orbs are in green
barrels, mo. If you find one
anywhere, feel free to smash it, mo.

rows.label: qst702801_msg0008
rows.name:
And absolutely do not use the pollen
orbs you collect, mo. Or Macmac will
give you a good spanking, mo.

rows.label: qst702801_msg0009
rows.name:
...Macmac? I'll return to Iira and
gather information on the fool, mo.

rows.label: qst702801_msg0010
rows.name:
On Adel-sama's honor, I will
find out where the fool is, mo!

rows.label: qst702801_msg0011
rows.name:
So that's the situation, mo. Please
help me find the green barrels and
collect the pollen orbs, mo!
